cartocss: #layer { polygon-fill: #826dba; polygon-opacity: 0; } #layer::outline { line-width: 1; line-color: #ffffff; line-opacity: 0.85; } #layer::outline [zoom > 4] { line-width: 1.1; line-color: #ffffff; line-opacity: 0.85; } #layer::outline [zoom > 5]{ line-width: 1.2; line-color: #ffffff; line-opacity: 0.85; } #layer::labels [zoom > 3]{ text-name: [name_engli]; text-face-name: 'Open Sans Regular'; text-opacity:1.0 ; text-size: 10; text-fill: #000000; text-character-spacing: 2.0 ; text-label-position-tolerance: 0; text-halo-radius: 2.5; text-halo-fill: fadeout(white, 30%); text-dy: -10; text-allow-overlap: false; text-placement: point; text-placement-type: dummy; } #layer::labels [zoom > 5] { text-name: [name_engli]; text-face-name: 'Open Sans Regular'; text-opacity:1.0 ; text-size: 11; text-fill: #000000; text-character-spacing: 2.0 ; text-label-position-tolerance: 0; text-halo-radius: 2.5; text-halo-fill: fadeout(white, 30%); text-dy: -10; text-allow-overlap: false; text-placement: point; text-placement-type: dummy; } #layer::labels [zoom > 8]{ text-name: [name_engli]; text-face-name: 'Open Sans Regular'; text-opacity:1.0 ; text-size: 13; text-fill: #000000; text-character-spacing: 2.0 ; text-label-position-tolerance: 0; text-halo-radius: 2.5; text-halo-fill: fadeout(white, 30%); text-dy: -10; text-allow-overlap: false; text-placement: point; text-placement-type: dummy; }
